[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 0020 - Statement - Consolidated Income Statement but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ImpairmentLossReversalOfImpairmentLossRecognisedInProfitOrLossTradeReceivables All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0129.9601] It is expected that RetainedEarnings with a value of 1,553,489,000 reported in the network role http://www.krka.biz/en/xbrl/role/ConsolidatedStatementofFinancialPosition should be equal to the dimensionally qualified concept, Equity with the dimension ifrs-full:ComponentsOfEquityAxis = ifrs-full:RetainedEarningsMember and a reported value of 118,350,000 multiplied by 1. This value appears in the network role http://www.krka.biz/en/xbrl/role/ConsolidatedStatementofChangesinEquity. This error occurs when the dimensionally qualified fact is not equal to the value input for the non dimensional item.
The properties of this ifrs-full:RetainedEarnings fact are:
